name: whoosh
description: Fast, pure-Python full text indexing, search, and spell checking library.
unavailable_reason: Repository is on bitbucket, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: Clear project description and installation instructions, but completely lacks code examples, quick start guide, and any practical usage demonstrations.
readme.top_issue: No quick start guide or code examples showing how to actually use the library - users must leave the README to learn basic usage

common_complaints: Long-standing bugs unfixed (issues from 2020-2022 still open)
Performance degradation in Python 3.x vs Python 2.7
Query parsing issues and edge cases (malformed queries causing crashes)
Spelling corrector bugs with NUMERIC fields
Outdated documentation and broken references (Bitbucket links)
Missing features and limitations (16k term limit in OR queries)
praise_themes: Gratitude for past work and library creation
sentiment.summary: Whoosh shows clear signs of abandonment with multiple critical bugs unfixed for 4+ years, no maintainer engagement, and users explicitly recommending the community fork whoosh-reloaded as a maintained alternative.

concerns: No commits in over 12 months (last commit January 2024)
Zero activity in past 6 months across all metrics
44 open issues with no recent closure or triage
No merged pull requests in 6+ months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release infrastructure may be inactive
maintenance.summary: Whoosh appears to be abandoned with over a year of inactivity, unresolved issues, and no maintenance or contribution activity.

analysis_summary.unavailable_reason: Repository is on bitbucket, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.
